article_title: HCA hospitals sue Molina Healthcare over emergency room payments in Miami-Dade
article_text:
HCA hospitals say Molina underpaid them for emergency services

About 3,000 Molina members treated at HCA hospitals in 2014-2015

Lawsuit filed in Miami-Dade Circuit Court in February

article_metadata.news-keywords: HCA, Hospital Corporation of America, Molina Healthcare, Molina, health insurance, Obamacare, Affordable Care Act, hospitals, Florida, price transparency
article_metadata.description: A group of Florida hospitals owned by HCA claim that Molina Healthcare underpaid them for emergency room services rendered to Molina’s Obamacare health plan members.
article_metadata.title: HCA hospitals sue Molina Healthcare over emergency room payments in Miami-Dade | Miami Herald

og.description: A group of Florida hospitals owned by HCA claim that Molina Healthcare underpaid them for emergency room services rendered to Molina’s Obamacare health plan members.
